sentences.english: A three-dimensional model for studying the surface shape of the rolls textured by laser beam is set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一种研究激光刻花轧辊表面形貌的三维模型。

sentences.english: Using the method of fractal geometry to describe the profile of grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 并用分形几何的方法描述砂轮表面轮廓形貌。

sentences.english: Surface morphologies of coatings prepared by SPPS presented obvious layer structure.
sentences.chinese: SPPS法制备的涂层表面形貌呈现明显的层状结构。

sentences.english: The microphotographs of SEM indicated the change of microcosmic morphology.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电子显微镜分析了表微观形貌的变化。

sentences.english: It was speculated that the morphology of ordered phase was needle-like.
sentences.chinese: 并推测有序相的形貌为针状。

sentences.english: Section morphology analysis can see a layer of obvious facies.
sentences.chinese: 断面形貌剖析能看到一层明显的堆积层。

sentences.english: The granule surface of starch had little change after heat-moist treatment (HMT).
sentences.chinese: 其中湿热处理前后淀粉的颗粒形貌变化较小。

sentences.english: The difference of deposition method of manganese dioxide was compared.
sentences.chinese: 并比较了不同方法电镀二氧化锰形貌的差异。

sentences.english: Fracture morphology analysis show that the fracture changes from a ductile fracture to a brittle fracture.
sentences.chinese: 断口形貌分析发现材料由韧性断裂转变成脆性断裂。

sentences.english: The morphology of pits are sharp streak pattern.
sentences.chinese: 点蚀形貌是敏锐的条纹状花样。

sentences.english: But the substance of morphology, each in turn choose in what should also.
sentences.chinese: 然则物之形貌，每决于何择于转折也。

sentences.english: The surface micro-topography was measured by a profilometer.
sentences.chinese: 通过表面轮廓仪测量并计算表面形貌统计参数。

sentences.english: The surface of delamination crack is of cleavage fracture appearance with large cleavage face.
sentences.chinese: 分层裂纹表面为解理形貌，解理面较大。

sentences.english: The fractures of the alloys change from dimple to cleavage fracture with river pattern.
sentences.chinese: 合金的断口形貌由韧窝向河流花纹状的解理形貌转变。

sentences.english: The fractures of the alloys change from dimple to cleavage fracture with river pattern.
sentences.chinese: 合金的断口形貌由韧窝向河流花纹状的解理形貌转变。

sentences.english: The micro-morphology of the sintered samples was observed with three-dimensional digital microscope.
sentences.chinese: 采用三维数字显微镜观察了烧结试样的微观形貌。

definition: appearance (esp. superficial)/looks/to judge a person by appearances
